cast.original_title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street
cast.overview: The infamous story of Benjamin Barker, a.k.a Sweeney Todd, who sets up a barber shop down in London which is the basis for a sinister partnership with his fellow tenant, Mrs. Lovett. Based on the hit Broadway musical.
cast.title: Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street

cast.overview: Orphaned and alone except for an uncle, Hugo Cabret lives in the walls of a train station in 1930s Paris. Hugo's job is to oil and maintain the station's clocks, but to him, his more important task is to protect a broken automaton and notebook left to him by his late father. Accompanied by the goddaughter of an embittered toy merchant, Hugo embarks on a quest to solve the mystery of the automaton and find a place he can call home.
cast.title: Hugo

details.biography:
Edward William "Ed" Sanders (born February 4, 1993) is an English actor and singer. He is best known for his performance as Tobias Ragg in the 2007 film Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street.

He was also featured on the film's soundtrack. He also appeared in the award-winning historical adventure drama film, Hugo (film) in 2011 where he was part of the ensemble.

Sanders was educated at Copthorne Preparatory School and sat his GCSE Exams at Ardingly College. Sanders started his Film Career off as Toby in Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street. Sanders is now working as a Sound Engineer in Hackney at Sound Solution Studios and he attends Kensington and Chelsea College two days a week.
details.name: Ed Sanders
